parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The current page number during paginated queries.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to display per page during paginated queries.

parameters.name: StrategyTaskId
parameters.description:
Strategy task ID.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribeSoarStrategyTasks](~~DescribeSoarStrategyTasks~~) interface.
